description: Article types are designed to support longer-form, authored content such as Blog Posts, Articles, Essays, Press Releases, or stand-alone page content. This is content that is published electronically (digital/online).

publisher.description: Name of the electronic publication if applicable. This will be mapped to .freetext.set_name. Typical a blog name or unit press room.

publish_date.description: ISO 8601 compliant date. Typically a year. This will be mapped to .freetext.date if applicable with the relevant precision.

publish_id.description: This is required for content authored and maintained outside of EDAN. This should be a unique identifier or permalink that allows content to be update/re-synced with the external data provider.

publisher_link.description: URI Type.Link to the blog, unit press room, etc.
